name: Mapmygenome India Limited
overview:
Mapmygenome is an indian genomics company

Personal genomics will play crucial role in more than one ways on many different fronts which will enable in realizing remedies for many medical conditions. It is also important due to the fact that if you are genetically predisposed to a certain condition it means that may you have inherited it from your parents and as the say ’apple does not fall far from the tree’, your children may inherit it from you, so it is important to understand what your genetic makeup is, because generally an adverse condition due to gene can be avoided or delayed by leading a good lifestyle.

We at MapmyGenome™ personal genomics services offer you a composite picture of your genetic makeup and help you understand what your genetic variations mean and how it may affect you. Prior to reporting your genetic predisposition to a certain health condition we take into consideration all the environmental factors, lifestyle and dietary habits while analyzing your susceptibility to any medical condition.
